MV DSI PYXIS, 60K DWT     BIN QASIM, PAKISTAN O/A SEPT 3RD
OR ALTERNATIVELY OPEN FUJAIRAH O/A 5TH SEPT.
OR ALTERNATIVELY ETA RICHARD BAY O/A 18TH SEPT 2024.
GRAIN CLEAN, TRY ANY,
PREF RELET BOP UPTO 10 DEC 2024
GO FOR MONEY
FULL DESCRIPTION ATTACHED
GROSS                                      :           34,547
NET                                          :           19,663
L.W.T.                                        :           10,947 MT

CLASS                                       :           NIPPON KAIJI KYOKAI, NS* MNS* (CSR, BC-A, BC-XII, GRAB 20, PSPC-WBT, NC, 1C) (ESP) (IWS) (PSCM) (M0) (STRENGTHENED FOR HEAVY CARGO LOADING WHERE HOLDS NO. 2 & 4 MAY BE EMPTY). INSTALLATION CHARACTERS: CHG, MPP, LSA, RCF, M0, AFS, BWM
DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT                :           60,362 MT AT 12.948 METERS SUMMER DRAFT
61,975 MT AT 13.217 METERS TROPICAL DRAFT
58,750 MT AT 12.679 METERS WINTER DRAFT

TPC AT FULL DRAFT                  :           60 METRIC TONS
FWA                                         :           296 MM
CONSTANTS                             :           600 MT INCLUDING FRESH WATER
BUNKER CAPACITY                    :           VLSFO 1,979.1 M³ & LSMGO 409.9 M³ (100% FULL)
WATER BALLAST                       :           34,564.6 M³ INCL. NO. 3 FLOODABLE HOLD
SPEED/CONSUMPTION:
IN BALLAST                               -        ABOUT 14.00 KNOTS ON ABOUT 22.50 MT VLSFO

CARGO GEAR                            :           4 X SWL 30 MT ELECTRIC HYDRAULIC DRIVEN SINGLE JIB CRANES
MAX SLEWING RADIUS 26 METERS AT 25 DEGREES (25⁰)
OUTREACH FROM SHIPS RAIL 9.8 METERS.
NO TWO CRANES TO WORK SIMULTANEOUSLY IN ONE HOLD.
SAFE WORKING LOAD (SWL) WITH GRABS 24 MT (BULK DENSITY X GRAB CAPACITY) INCLUDING GRAB WEIGHT.
